snippet.title: Boulders and Bombs for the Atari 8-bit family
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

(From the packaging)

Tunnel through alien underground, blasting through boulders, eluding spreading green fungus, dodging nuclear rods or Boom- you're a fossil!

Trapped! And all you have to escape this alien underground is your rotating auger, a few bombs, one day and one night. Those boulders you see- avoid them. They can cost you seconds and consequently, your escape. Watch out! Those Probe Birds are releasing nuclear rods that explode into creeping green fungus to block your tunnel- or turn you into a fossil. As you forge ahead, pick up every bomb you pass. You'll need them to blast your way out of tight spots. At all times, keep your wits- that auger can turn on you.

Sound intense? You've got 98 more levels to go. 

* 1-4 Players 


What I think:

A really unique game...that is just "okay" gameplay-wise.
